doc:
John Comer https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Comer 0 John Comer (died 11 February 1984) was a British comic actor. He was best known for his roles in Coronation Street as Mr Birtles then as a Taxi Driver and later as Wilf Jones, in Emmerdale Farm as Ernie Shuttleworth, Les Brandon in I Didn't Know You Cared and Cafe Owner Sid in Last of the Summer Wine . John_Comer ( died 11_February_1984 ) was a_British_comic_actor . He was_best_known for his_roles in Coronation_Street as Mr_Birtles then as a_Taxi_Driver and later_as Wilf_Jones , in Emmerdale_Farm as Ernie_Shuttleworth , Les_Brandon in I Did n't Know You Cared and Cafe_Owner_Sid in Last of the_Summer_Wine .
